title: Introduction to Traditional Chinese Medicine | Happening @ Michigan
cleaned_text: Michigan Alternative Medicine Club ](/group/2806) Introduction to Traditional Chinese Medicine MAMC TCM Series Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) theory is the basis for acupuncture, acupressure/Shiatsu massage, Emotional Freedom Techniques, Chinese herbal therapy, and other! But TCM is more than just treatment and cures; like Ayurveda, it is a way of living healthfully. Chenyi Xue, UM bioinformatics grad student from China, will tell us what it means to have a balance of Yin and Yang in the body and mind. Learn about the flow of Qi energy along the body's meridians. Please join MAMC for this exciting multimedia presentation! Chenyi Xue, UM bioinformatics grad student from China, will tell us what it means to have a balance of Yin and Yang in the body and mind.
